items.label: Ascendant Aces
items.info: August 28, 2025 - September 17, 2025 Unlocked by default

items.label: Bountiful Crescendo
items.info: September 11, 2025 - September 18, 2025 Reach Union Level 14

items.label: Marks of the Wild
items.info: September 4, 2025 - September 22, 2025 Reach Union Level 14 and complete the first hunt in Main Quest Chapter II Act VIII "By Sun's Burning Hand."

items.label: Second Coming of Solaris (Ultra)
items.info: September 17, 2025 - October 6, 2025 Reach Union Level 14

items.label: Tidal Defense Simulator
items.info: August 30, 2025 - October 8, 2025 Complete Main Quest Chapter 2 Prologue "Through the Sea Thou Break"

items.label: Hunt of Ash and Steel
items.info: August 28, 2025 - October 8, 2025 Complete the first hunt in the Main Quest “By Sun’s Burning Hand”

items.label: Sanguis Plateaus Travel Atlas
items.info: August 28, 2025 - October 8, 2025 Reach Union Level 14, and complete the first hunt in Main Quest “By the Burning Sun's Hand”

items.label: Prints of Plateaus
items.info: August 28, 2025 - October 8, 2025 Complete Main Chapter II Act VIII and Side Quest “Scales of Past” to unlock

items.label: Gifts of the Hunt
items.info: August 28, 2025 - October 8, 2025 Log in during Version 2.6

items.label: Gifts of the Moon Roamer
items.info: September 17, 2025 - October 8, 2025 Reach Union Level 8 and log in between September 17, 2025 to October 8, 2025

items.label: Chord Cleansing
items.info: October 1, 2025 - October 8, 2025 Earn double echo and echo leveling material drops during this event!

items.label: Beyond the Waves
items.info: September 25, 2025 - October 8, 2025 Log-in daily and complete tasks to win random rewards by revealing tiles on a board!

items.label: Moonlit Revelation
items.info: September 25, 2025 - October 8, 2025 Log-in daily to reveal lunar secrets which grant you rewards and a daily exploration buff!

items.label: Nice Weather for Dromases
items.info: Duration: 09/24 - 11/03/2025 Become a dromas caretaker and facilitate their development as they grow!

items.label: Colorful Mayhem
items.info: Duration: 09/30 - 11/03/2025 Play familiar bumper fight and match-3 mini-games to earn points and receive rewards!

items.label: 3.6 Planar Fissure
items.info: Duration: 10/08 - 10/20/2025 Get double the planar ornaments when challenging Worlds in the Simulated Universe!

items.label: Try-Not-to-Laugh Challenge
items.info: Duration: 10/15 - 11/03/2025 Challenge various combat stages with the help of buffs from Suprise Gifts!

items.label: 3.6 Realm of the Strange
items.info: Duration: 10/24 - 11/03/2025 Get double the relics when challenging Caverns of Corrosion!

items.label: 3.6 Gift of Odyssey
items.info: Duration: 09/24 - 11/04/2025 Log in a total of 7 days to claim up 10 Star Rail Special Passes!

items.label: Pact of Permansor Terrae
items.info: Duration: 10/15/2025 - End of 4.0 Log in during the event to claim a free copy of Permansor Terrae and his upgrade materials!

items.label: Conductor's Special Treat
items.info: Duration: 09/24/2025 - Before End of 3.7 Log in during the event to receive an Interference Key, Lone Stardust, and Jade Feathers in the mail!
